variables.description:
Default variables for the Kubernetes worker.

The schema for this class is used to populate the `variables` section of the default
base job template.

name.description: Name given to infrastructure created by a worker.
name.title: Name

env.description: Environment variables to set when starting a flow run.
env.title: Environment Variables

labels.description: Labels applied to infrastructure created by a worker.
labels.title: Labels

command.description: The command to use when starting a flow run. In most cases, this should be left blank and the command will be automatically generated by the worker.
command.title: Command

namespace.description: The Kubernetes namespace to create jobs within.
namespace.title: Namespace

image.description: The image reference of a container image to use for created jobs. If not set, the latest Prefect image will be used.
image.title: Image

service_account_name.description: The Kubernetes service account to use for job creation.
service_account_name.title: Service Account Name

image_pull_policy.description: The Kubernetes image pull policy to use for job containers.
image_pull_policy.title: Image Pull Policy

backoff_limit.description: The number of times Kubernetes will retry a job after pod eviction. If set to 0, Prefect will reschedule the flow run when the pod is evicted.
backoff_limit.title: Backoff Limit

finished_job_ttl.description: The number of seconds to retain jobs after completion. If set, finished jobs will be cleaned up by Kubernetes after the given delay. If not set, jobs will be retained indefinitely.
finished_job_ttl.title: Finished Job TTL

job_watch_timeout_seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait for each event emitted by a job before timing out. If not set, the worker will wait for each event indefinitely.
job_watch_timeout_seconds.title: Job Watch Timeout Seconds

pod_watch_timeout_seconds.description: Number of seconds to watch for pod creation before timing out.
pod_watch_timeout_seconds.title: Pod Watch Timeout Seconds

stream_output.description: If set, output will be streamed from the job to local standard output.
stream_output.title: Stream Output

cluster_config.description: The Kubernetes cluster config to use for job creation.

KubernetesClusterConfig.description:
Stores configuration for interaction with Kubernetes clusters.

See `from_file` for creation.

config.description: The entire contents of a kubectl config file.
config.title: Config

context_name.description: The name of the kubectl context to use.
context_name.title: Context Name

KubernetesClusterConfig.title: KubernetesClusterConfig
